Air Fryer Egg Tart Guide | Generated by AI

Home 2025.09

Ingredients:

  • 6-8 frozen egg tart shells (or homemade puff pastry)
  • 2 large eggs
  • 100ml (½ cup) whole milk (full-fat for best texture)
  • 100ml (½ cup) heavy cream (or evaporated milk for richer flavor)
  • 40g (3 tbsp) granulated sugar (adjust to taste)
  • ½ tsp vanilla extract (optional)

Step-by-Step Instructions:

1. Prepare the Custard Filling

  • Whisk eggs, milk, heavy cream, sugar, and vanilla until smooth.
  • Strain the mixture through a sieve to remove bubbles for a silky texture.

2. Fill the Tart Shells

  • Place frozen tart shells in the air fryer basket (no thawing needed).
  • Fill each shell ¾ full (they expand while cooking).

3. Air Fry the Egg Tarts

  • Preheat air fryer to 160°C (320°F) for 3 minutes.
  • Cook at 160°C (320°F) for 10–12 minutes until:
    • Custard is set but slightly jiggly.
    • Pastry is golden and flaky.
  • Tip: Cover loosely with foil if pastry browns too quickly.

4. Cool & Serve

  • Let cool for 5 minutes before eating (custard firms as it cools).
  • Enjoy warm or chilled!

Ingredient Substitutions & Tips:

Milk Options:

  • Best: Whole milk (creamy) or evaporated milk (richer).
  • Lighter: Low-fat milk (add 1 extra yolk for richness).
  • Dairy-free: Oat milk + 1 tsp cornstarch (less creamy).

Sugar Options:

  • Granulated sugar works best (dissolves evenly).
  • For caramel notes, use brown sugar (reduce by 1 tbsp).
  • Sugar-free? Substitute with erythritol (1:1 ratio).

Heavy Cream Alternatives:

  • Simpler: Use 50% milk + 50% evaporated milk.
  • Luxury: Double cream (extra rich, less stable).
  • Dairy-free: Coconut cream (shaken, not stirred).

Pastry Shortcuts:

  • No shells? Use puff pastry cut into circles.
  • Extra flaky? Brush shells with melted butter pre-baking.

Troubleshooting:

  • Custard bubbly? Strain better or pour slower.
  • Shells soggy? Preheat air fryer longer.
  • Overflowing? Fill only ⅔ full next time.

Final Pro Tip:

For Portuguese-style tarts, sprinkle cinnamon or caramelize the tops with a kitchen torch!

Happy air frying! Let me know if you’d like a homemade pastry recipe too. 😊
